ai-patthana14.28:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.28:0.3_0: Talking for the sake of seeing, they get the cause of (living creatures).
ai-patthana14.28:1.1_0: With seeing the cause, without cause, without reason, because of seeing the reason, the teaching gives up the cause, and with reason.
ai-patthana14.28:1.1_1: With seeing the cause, without reason, they give up the cause, without reason, because of seeing the reason, because of not seeing the cause,
ai-patthana14.28:1.1_2: This is the section in brief.
